title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same generate/chat/embed API surface as Python.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package exposing Ollama models as standard LangChain LLMs and embedders.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama: folders, prompts, sharing, multimodal, RAG, admin panel, dark/light themes.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Turn any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot replacement inside VS Code with inline completions and chat.

title: chainlit-ollama
summary: Chainlit data-annotator & conversational UI integration for Ollama; build shareable LLM apps in minutes.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Minimal but colourful CLI wrapper around Ollama with readline history, markdown rendering, and model switching.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Ready-to-run Retrieval-Augmented-Generation template using Ollama + Chroma + LangChain in a single Docker Compose.

title: ollama-telegram
summary: Self-hosted Telegram bot that forwards messages to a local Ollama instance and streams answers back.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in production-grade NLP pipelines.

title: ollama4j
summary: Unofficial Java SDK for Ollama with fluent API, streaming, and Micronaut/Spring starters on Maven Central.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with async streaming, dependency-injection helpers, and Blazor sample.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node-selector and PVC support.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package exposing the same JavaScript client shipped in ollama-js repo; 50 kB, zero deps.

title: ollama-pypi
summary: Official PyPI package for the Ollama Python SDK; supports 3.8+, asyncio, and binary response streaming.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot slash-command integration for Ollama with per-guild model settings and conversation memory.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up an Ollama service container and exposes it to your CI pipelines for LLM-powered tests.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Unofficial async Rust crate for Ollama with Tokio, Serde, and examples for Axum and Tauri apps.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library generated from the OpenAPI spec; idiomatic structs and streaming helpers.
